name: escutcheon
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a flat piece of metal around something, for example a key hole or door handle
ptasha/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
a shield (= flat shape or badge) with a coat of arms (= special symbol of a family, institution, etc.) on it
Geography Photos/Universal Images Group/GettyImages
